alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 9:58PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dale, northeastern Houston, Henry and northern Coffee Counties in southeastern Alabama, southern Clay, Mitchell, southern Calhoun and Early Counties in southwestern Georgia, Colquitt, western Tift and southern Worth Counties in south central Georgia, northeastern Decatur, northern Grady, Miller, Baker Counties in southwestern Georgia and northern Thomas Counties in south central Georgia through 1145 PM EDT/1045 PM CDT/... At 1057 PM EDT/957 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Phillipsburg to near Doerun to 10 miles south of Leary to near Abbeville to near Troy Municipal Airport. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Colquitt, Fort Gaines, Newton, Tifton, Pelham, Headland, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Moultrie, Blakely, Camilla, Dothan, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Cowarts, Arlington, Webb and Omega. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
